english.segment1: Lord, You take my heart away with Your love. and I am willing to put on my faith in Your plan.
english.segment2: Come and take my life. Make my soul refreshed in truth now.
english.segment3: I am ready for You. Take my heart and make me new now. I am ready for You. to come and fill my soul.
english.segment4: Cleanse all of my mind that is not of You. Break me, teaching me how to find rest in Your hands.
english.segment5: Come and take my life. Make my soul refreshed in truth now.
english.segment6: I am ready for You. Take my heart and make me new now. I am ready for You. to come and fill my soul. To come and fill my soul.
english.segment7: Whatever it takes, I'm needing to make Your will be done. and I'm letting go of my control, for I see what You've done in me.
english.segment8: I am ready for You. Take my heart and make me new now. I am ready for You. to come and fill my soul.
